Weather forecast

This component demonstrates fetching data from the server.

{{ contact.dateCreated }} {{ contact.dateModified }} {{ contact.firstName }} {{ contact.lastName }} {{ contact.phoneNumber }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html' }) export class FetchDataComponent { public contacts: Contacts[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'weatherforecast').subscribe(result => { this.contacts = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Contacts { dateCreated: string; dateModified: string; firstName: string; lastName: string; phoneNumber: string; }
